trans-unit.source: The image compression saved you about %s of your file size!
API key: Please insert your Tinyfy API key
Enable or disable debugging mode. Stops extension from compressing images. Use in development mode to avoid waisting compressions.
Comma-separated list of folders which should be excluded from compression. Relative from storage (e.g. fileadmin), starting with "/" (e.g. "/user_upload,/folder_under_fileadmin")
Comma-separated list of supported image mime types.
Show image compression limit within the system information toolbar.
Compression Provider: Select which compression provider to use (tinify = TinyPNG API, local-tools = jpegoptim/optipng/etc., local-basic = ImageMagick/GraphicsMagick)
JPEG Quality (1-100): Quality setting for local JPEG compression
PNG Quality (1-100): Quality setting for local PNG compression (pngquant)
WebP Quality (1-100): Quality setting for local WebP compression
